item.title: Zhi Wang
item.description: Zhi Wang is a master student at University of Waterloo. His major is quantatitative finance. His research interests includes stochastic process and its application in finance, markov chain, time series (ARCH/GARCH) and statistical learning. He is currently looking for a internship between May 2021 and August 2021. His ideal job placement is in quantatitative area including but not limited to model validation, risk management and front desk trading support.
